General.Name: Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacture, supply, and sale of flexible packaging products in Indonesia. It offers various plastic products for the pharmaceutical, food, cosmetics, agrochemical, and other industries. The company was formerly known as PT Kageo Igar Jaya Tbk and changed its name to PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk in October 2010. PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kingsford Holdings.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Sultan Agung Km. 28.5, Bekasi, Indonesia, 17133
